entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
